name: Robotage
description:
RoBot-Age - an amazing adventure awaits!

Ro-Bots have been left on their own, also their most powerful bot lost the biggest battle in their history and has to recover in order to fulfill his destiny

Explore the giant map

Recover your Abilities and Power you lost after the battle against Geo-Bot

Find hidden gems to upgrade your powers!

And finally destroy your biggest danger and enemy!

[It's darkened for a reason :) ]
